# portraitEffectsMatte

**Instance Property**

The portrait effects matte associated with the image.

## Declaration

```swift
var portraitEffectsMatte: AVPortraitEffectsMatte? { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPortraitEffectsMatte] representation of portrait effects.

## Accessing Original Image Content

- **cgImage**: The CoreGraphics image object this image was created from, if applicable.
- **pixelBuffer**: The CoreVideo pixel buffer this image was created from, if applicable.
- **depthData**: Depth data associated with the image.
- **semanticSegmentationMatte**
